entries.arrival_phase_1: Getting a lock on the drifting ship now. Stand by for coordinates.
entries.arrival_phase_2: We have sent the vessel's location to your nav computer. It appears to be on autopilot. Disable the vessel's engines and reset the autopilot to return to Imperial space.
entries.attack_notify: pcontrast1 Tactical Computer:pcontrast3 <Incoming enemy fighters detected.>
entries.capture_complete: Autopilot reset. Escort vessel back into Imperial space.
entries.capture_started: Beginning reprogramming of autopilot program. Stand by.
entries.complete: Shuttle is on its way back to Imperial controlled space.
entries.failed_destroy: We needed that shuttle to search it for clues. You incompentance cost us the best lead that we had. Report back to your commander immediately.
entries.failed_escape: You lost a shuttle that was on auto pilot? That sort of bumbling is the kind that gets men demoted. Report to your superior.
entries.quest_disable_d: Once you intercept the freighter, disable it so the autopilot can be reprogrammed.
entries.quest_escort_d: Follow the freighter until it reaches it's destination. Be on the look out for enemy fighters who might not want this ship recovered.
entries.quest_location_d: The ship is adrift in the Dantooine system. Intercept the vessel before it can drift out of the system.
entries.quest_recover_d: Move in close to the vessel and wait for the capture process to begin.
entries.recovery_success: You have served well. The vessel will be investigated and perhaps we can gain a clue as to why it was here.
entries.split_quest_alert: Now that we have the shuttle lets see what else those mercenaries can tell us. Return to mercenary space, disable, and inspect another mercenary officer.
entries.target_disabled: The engines on the shuttle have shut down. Move in close to the freighter and reprogram it's autopilot.
entries.taunt_1: That ship belongs to us! We stole it from the Empire fair and square.
entries.taunt_2: You might as well give us back that shuttle, since you dont have a choice anyways.
entries.taunt_3: I will not only take the shuttle but I will also destroy you.
entries.taunt_4: Your such a waste of good laser beams.
entries.taunt_5: You really should have stayed at home.
entries.title: Dantooine System: Capture the Civilian Freighter
entries.title_d: Insurgent has somehow discovered the location of an abandoned ship drifting along the outer rim of the system. He wants you to intercept and bring this vessel back so it can be examined. He believes that it might have some significance with his investigation.
